sent.orig: The impulse increases to a wish, the wish to a desire, the desire an uncontrollable longing.
sent.trans: 冲动增长为愿望，愿望变为欲望，欲望导致无法抑制的渴求。

sent.orig: To desire action is to desire limitation.
sent.trans: 对行动的渴望就是对限制的渴望。

sent.orig: We all have the desire to talk, but also have the desire to listen to.
sent.trans: 我们都是有倾诉的欲望的，也有着聆听的欲望。

sent.orig: Not because I desire a gift: but I desire fruit that may abound to your account.
sent.trans: 我并不求什么馈送，所求的就是你们的果子渐渐增多，归在你们的账上。

sent.orig: There will be many people alive the desire, desire more, will gradually wish dissatisfaction.
sent.trans: 人活着都会有许多的欲望，欲望多了，渐渐会欲求不满。
